(* If the operator changes conditions then we reset our condition for a scan, making sure that the changes take * effect *) Out := FALSE;
IF (Current_Conditions.Action_Type <> Stored_Conditions.Action_Type) OR (Current_Conditions.Higher_Pos <> Stored_Conditions.Higher_Pos) OR (Current_Conditions.Input_Number <> Stored_Conditions.Input_Number) OR (Current_Conditions.Kind <> Stored_Conditions.Kind) OR (Current_Conditions.Lower_Pos <> Stored_Conditions.Lower_Pos) OR (Current_Conditions.Pulse <> Stored_Conditions.Pulse) OR (Current_Conditions.On_Stroke <> Stored_Conditions.On_Stroke) OR (Current_Conditions.Timer_Type <> Stored_Conditions.Timer_Type) THEN Stored_Conditions := Current_Conditions; Out := TRUE; END_IF;
